text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 407 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS BACK TO CONTENTS z Some of the existing buildings contribute positively to the character of the area, and adaptive re-use of these existing buildings should be explored. This includes the brick-faced buildings along Whitechapel High Street, the original Calcutta House building, the Annex to Calcutta House, and the locally listed wash houses towards the north of the site. Routes and streets z Improve walking and cycling connections to and from the site, ensuring high quality connections to the underground stations at Aldgate and Aldgate East. Improvements to the green grid should be delivered along Whitechapel High Street, and good quality connections should be provided to the green grid route to the north of the site at Wentworth Street. Environment and public realm z Improved public realm and active frontages should be provided at
